sn35.63:1.2: Atha kho ayasma migajalo yena bhagava …pe…
sn35.63:1.3: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma migajalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.63:1.5: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, ekavihari hoti, kittavata ca pana sadutiyavihari hoti”ti?
sn35.63:2.1: “Santi kho, migajala, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.63:2.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.63:2.3: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn35.63:2.6: Nandisamyojanasamyutto kho, migajala, bhikkhu sadutiyavihariti vuccati.
sn35.63:2.8: Santi kho, migajala, jivhavinneyya rasa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.63:2.9: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.63:2.10: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn35.63:2.13: Nandisamyojanasamyutto kho, migajala, bhikkhu sadutiyavihariti vuccati.
sn35.63:2.14: Evamvihari ca, migajala, bhikkhu kincapi arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevati appasaddani appanigghosani vijanavatani manussarahasseyyakani patisallanasaruppani;
sn35.63:3.1: Santi ca kho, migajala, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.63:3.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn35.63:3.3: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nandi nirujjhati.
sn35.63:3.6: Nandisamyojanavisamyutto kho, migajala, bhikkhu ekavihariti vuccati …pe…
sn35.63:3.7: santi ca kho, migajala, jivhavinneyya rasa …pe…
sn35.63:3.8: santi ca kho, migajala, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.63:3.9: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn35.63:3.10: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nandi nirujjhati.
sn35.63:3.13: Nandisamyojanavippayutto kho, migajala, bhikkhu ekavihariti vuccati.
sn35.63:3.14: Evamvihari ca, migajala, bhikkhu kincapi gamante viharati akinno bhikkhuhi bhikkhunihi upasakehi upasikahi rajuhi rajamahamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasavakehi.
